an11.13:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmim nigrodharame.
an11.13:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhagava savatthiyam vassavasam upagantukamo hoti.
an11.13:2.5: Tattha kammantanceva adhitthahissami, bhagavantanca lacchami kalena kalam dassanaya”ti.
an11.13:3.1: Atha kho bhagava savatthiyam vassavasam upagacchi.
an11.13:3.2: Nandiyopi kho sakko savatthiyam vassavasam upagacchi.
an11.13:3.3: Tattha kammantanceva adhitthasi, bhagavantanca labhi kalena kalam dassanaya.
an11.13:3.4: Tena kho pana samayena sambahula bhikkhu bhagavato civarakammam karonti:
an11.13:4.4: Atha kho nandiyo sakko yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho nandiyo sakko bhagavantam etadavoca:
an11.13:4.8: Tesam no, bhante, nanaviharehi viharatam kenassa viharena vihatabban”ti?
an11.13:5.2: Etam kho, nandiya, tumhakam patirupam kulaputtanam, yam tumhe tathagatam upasankamitva puccheyyatha:
an11.13:5.3: ‘tesam no, bhante, nanaviharehi viharatam kenassa viharena vihatabban’ti?
an11.13:5.4: Saddho kho, nandiya, aradhako hoti, no assaddho;
an11.13:5.10: Imesu kho te, nandiya, chasu dhammesu patitthaya pancasu dhammesu ajjhattam sati upatthapetabba.
an11.13:6.2: ‘itipi so bhagava araham sammasambuddho vijjacaranasampanno sugato lokavidu anuttaro purisadammasarathi, sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagava’ti.
an11.13:6.3: Iti kho te, nandiya, tathagatam arabbha ajjhattam sati upatthapetabba.
an11.13:7.1: Puna caparam tvam, nandiya, dhammam anussareyyasi:
an11.13:7.2: ‘svakkhato bhagavata dhammo sanditthiko akaliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattam veditabbo vinnuhi’ti.
an11.13:7.3: Iti kho te, nandiya, dhammam arabbha ajjhattam sati upatthapetabba.
an11.13:8.1: Puna caparam tvam, nandiya, kalyanamitte anussareyyasi:
an11.13:8.3: yassa me kalyanamitta anukampaka atthakama ovadaka anusasaka’ti.
an11.13:8.4: Iti kho te, nandiya, kalyanamitte arabbha ajjhattam sati upatthapetabba.
an11.13:9.1: Puna caparam tvam, nandiya, attano cagam anussareyyasi:
an11.13:9.3: yoham maccheramalapariyutthitaya pajaya vigatamalamaccherena cetasa agaram ajjhavasami muttacago payatapani vossaggarato yacayogo danasamvibhagarato’ti.
an11.13:9.4: Iti kho te, nandiya, cagam arabbha ajjhattam sati upatthapetabba.
an11.13:10.1: Puna caparam tvam, nandiya, devata anussareyyasi:
an11.13:10.2: ‘ya devata atikkammeva kabalikaraharabhakkhanam devatanam sahabyatam annataram manomayam kayam upapanna, ta karaniyam attano na samanupassanti katassa va paticayam’.
an11.13:10.3: Seyyathapi, nandiya, bhikkhu asamayavimutto karaniyam attano na samanupassati katassa va paticayam;
an11.13:10.4: evamevam kho, nandiya, ya ta devata atikkammeva kabalikaraharabhakkhanam devatanam sahabyatam annataram manomayam kayam upapanna, ta karaniyam attano na samanupassanti katassa va paticayam.
an11.13:10.5: Iti kho te, nandiya, devata arabbha ajjhattam sati upatthapetabba.
an11.13:11.1: Imehi kho, nandiya, ekadasahi dhammehi samannagato ariyasavako pajahateva papake akusale dhamme, na upadiyati.
an11.13:11.2: Seyyathapi, nandiya, kumbho nikkujjo vamateva udakam, no vantam paccavamati;
an11.13:11.3: seyyathapi va pana, nandiya, sukkhe tinadaye aggi mutto dahanneva gacchati, no daddham paccudavattati;
an11.13:11.4: evamevam kho, nandiya, imehi ekadasahi dhammehi samannagato ariyasavako pajahateva papake akusale dhamme, na upadiyati”ti.
